quotes.quote: It is very obvious that we are not influenced by 'facts' but by our interpretation of the facts.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler
quotes.html_blockquote:
“It is very obvious that we are not influenced by 'facts' but by our interpretation of the facts.” —
Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: In the middle of chaos lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.html_blockquote:
“In the middle of chaos lies opportunity. ” —
Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: You win more from losing than winning.
quotes.author: Morgan Wootten
quotes.html_blockquote:
“You win more from losing than winning.” —
Morgan Wootten

quotes.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.html_blockquote:
“In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.” —
Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Thinking will not overcome fear but action will. ” —
W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Life is a long lesson in humility. ” —
James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.” —
Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.” —
Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. if you are at peace, you are living in the present.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.html_blockquote:
“If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. if you are at peace, you are living in the present.” —
Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Discipline yourself, and others won't need to.
quotes.author: John Wooden
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Discipline yourself, and others won't need to.” —
John Wooden

quotes.quote: You don't have to move mountains. You'll change the world simply by being a warm, kind-hearted human being.
quotes.author: Anita Krizzan
quotes.html_blockquote:
“You don't have to move mountains. You'll change the world simply by being a warm, kind-hearted human being.” —
Anita Krizzan

quotes.quote: Hope itself is like a star- not to be seen in the sunshine of prosperity, and only to be discovered in the night of adversity.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Hope itself is like a star- not to be seen in the sunshine of prosperity, and only to be discovered in the night of adversity.” —
Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of the nonessentials.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang
quotes.html_blockquote:
“The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of the nonessentials.” —
Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Resentment or grudges do no harm to the person against whom you hold these feelings but every day and every night of your life, they are eating at you.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Resentment or grudges do no harm to the person against whom you hold these feelings but every day and every night of your life, they are eating at you.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Among the things you can give and still keep are your word, a smile, and a grateful heart.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Among the things you can give and still keep are your word, a smile, and a grateful heart.” —
Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If there's a definition of freedom, I think it's this: living life on your terms.
quotes.author: Kamal Ravikant
quotes.html_blockquote:
“If there's a definition of freedom, I think it's this: living life on your terms.” —
Kamal Ravikant

quotes.quote: There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge...
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.html_blockquote:
“There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge...” —
Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Success is not what you do when you are on top.  Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.
quotes.author: Sonia Ricotti
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Success is not what you do when you are on top. Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.” —
Sonia Ricotti

quotes.quote: The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.
quotes.author: Dan Brown
quotes.html_blockquote:
“The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.” —
Dan Brown

quotes.quote: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.html_blockquote:
“When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you. ” —
Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You cannot find peace avoiding life.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf
quotes.html_blockquote:
“You cannot find peace avoiding life.” —
Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself. ” —
Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.
quotes.author: Rumi
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.” —
Rumi

quotes.quote: One of the keys to happiness is a bad memory.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown
quotes.html_blockquote:
“One of the keys to happiness is a bad memory.” —
Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: The older you get, the better you get. Unless you're a banana.
quotes.author: Betty White
quotes.html_blockquote:
“The older you get, the better you get. Unless you're a banana.” —
Betty White

quotes.quote: Listen to the secret sound, the real sound, which is inside you.
quotes.author: Kabir
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Listen to the secret sound, the real sound, which is inside you.” —
Kabir

quotes.quote: Saying nothing sometimes says the most.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Saying nothing sometimes says the most.” —
Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Better the cottage where one is merry than the palace where one weeps.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Better the cottage where one is merry than the palace where one weeps.” —
Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
quotes.html_blockquote:
“How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours. ” —
Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Everything flows, nothing stands still.
quotes.author: Heraclitus
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Everything flows, nothing stands still.” —
Heraclitus

quotes.quote: People who belittle people, will be LITTLE people, and will accomplish very Little
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.html_blockquote:
“People who belittle people, will be LITTLE people, and will accomplish very Little” —
Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: New beginnings are disguised as painful endings.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.html_blockquote:
“New beginnings are disguised as painful endings.” —
Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder
quotes.html_blockquote:
“I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.” —
Estee Lauder

quotes.quote: Our joy does not have to be based on our circumstances.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Our joy does not have to be based on our circumstances.” —
Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Embody what you teach, and teach only what you have embodied.
quotes.author: Dan Millman
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Embody what you teach, and teach only what you have embodied.” —
Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.
quotes.author: John Wooden
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.” —
John Wooden

quotes.quote: To live fully is to be always in no-man's-land, to experience each moment as completely new and fresh.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron
quotes.html_blockquote:
“To live fully is to be always in no-man's-land, to experience each moment as completely new and fresh.” —
Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Night is a more quiet time to work. It aids thought.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Night is a more quiet time to work. It aids thought.” —
Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie
quotes.html_blockquote:
“People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents.” —
Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: An intelligent person hires people who are more intelligent than he is.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki
quotes.html_blockquote:
“An intelligent person hires people who are more intelligent than he is.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift
quotes.html_blockquote:
“A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.” —
Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.html_blockquote:
“An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.” —
Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Deliberately seek the company of people who influence you to think and act on building the life you desire.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Deliberately seek the company of people who influence you to think and act on building the life you desire.” —
Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Values are like fingerprints. Nobody's are the same, but you leave 'em all over everything you do.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Values are like fingerprints. Nobody's are the same, but you leave 'em all over everything you do.” —
Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Relax. Nothing is under control.
quotes.author: Adi Da Samraj
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Relax. Nothing is under control.” —
Adi Da Samraj

quotes.quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy
quotes.html_blockquote:
“The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.” —
Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Walk slowly but never walk backward.
quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Walk slowly but never walk backward.” —
Unknown

quotes.quote: A day wasted on others is not wasted on one's self.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens
quotes.html_blockquote:
“A day wasted on others is not wasted on one's self.” —
Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.html_blockquote:
“Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.” —
Helen Keller
